Package com.company

Class Basket

java.lang.Object
com.company.Basket
public class Basket
extends java.lang.Object
This class represents a costumer's basket. A costumer chooses a product and the product is added to an ArrayList. Costumers can also remove products from their basket. This class contains a method to calculate the total amount of money that the costumer should pay for the chosen products.
Since:
15/4/2021
Version:
1.0
Author:
KIMIA

  • Constructor Details

    • Basket

      public Basket()
      This is the constructor of the class. It creates a new ArrayList to store the costumers chosen products and allocates memory.

  • Method Details

    • getProducts

      public java.util.ArrayList<Product> getProducts()
      A getter for the ArrayList of products.
      Returns:
      the ArrayList of products

    • setProducts

      public void setProducts​(java.util.ArrayList<Product> products)
      A setter that sets the ArrayList of products to the given parameter.
      Parameters:
      products - a new ArrayList of products

    • addProduct

      public void addProduct​(Product product, Inventory inventory)
      This method adds a product to the basket. It prints an error message if the inventory is out of the given product.
      Parameters:
      product - the product to add to the basket
      inventory - the current inventory

    • removeProduct

      public void removeProduct​(int i, Inventory inventory)
      Removes the ith product from the list and moves it back to the inventory by incrementing its stock.
      Parameters:
      i - the index of the product inside the basket
      inventory - the current inventory

    • totalPrice

      public double totalPrice()
      This method calculates the whole fee.
      Returns:
      the total price of the chosen products

    • toString

      public java.lang.String toString()
      This method iterates the products, converts them into json object and creates a String in json format.
      Overrides:
      toString in class java.lang.Object
      Returns:
      the basket's information in String
